net.corda.core.contracts

Class StatePointer<T extends ContractState>

  • net.corda.core.contracts.StatePointer<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearPointer, StaticPointer

    @DoNotImplement
public class StatePointer<T extends ContractState>

    A class StatePointer contains a pointer to a interface ContractState. The class StatePointer can be included in a interface ContractState or included in an off-ledger data structure. class StatePointers can be resolved to a class StateAndRef by performing a vault query. There are two types of pointers; linear and static. class LinearPointers are for use with interface LinearStates. class StaticPointers are for use with any type of interface ContractState.

    See Also:
    class StatePointer, pointer, interface ContractState, class StatePointer, interface ContractState, class StatePointer, class StateAndRef, class LinearPointer, interface LinearState, class StaticPointer, interface ContractState

      • Companion

        public static net.corda.core.contracts.StatePointer.Companion Companion

    • Method Detail

      • getPointer

        @NotNull
public java.lang.Object getPointer()

        An identifier for the interface ContractState that this class StatePointer points to.

        See Also:
        interface ContractState, class StatePointer

      • getType

        @NotNull
public java.lang.Class<T> getType()

        Type of the state which is being pointed to.

      • isResolved

        public boolean isResolved()

        Determines whether the state pointer should be resolved to a reference input when used in a transaction.

      • resolve

        @NotNull
public StateAndRef<T> resolve(@NotNull
                                       ServiceHub services)

        Resolves a class StatePointer to a class StateAndRef via a vault query. This method will either return a class StateAndRef or return an exception.

        Parameters:
        services - a interface ServiceHub implementation is required to resolve the pointer.
        See Also:
        class StatePointer, class StateAndRef, class StateAndRef

      • resolve

        @NotNull
public StateAndRef<T> resolve(@NotNull
                                       LedgerTransaction ltx)

        Resolves a class StatePointer to a class StateAndRef from inside a class LedgerTransaction. The intuition here is that all of the pointed-to states will be included in the transaction as reference states.

        Parameters:
        ltx - the class LedgerTransaction containing the pointer and pointed-to states.
        See Also:
        class StatePointer, class StateAndRef, class LedgerTransaction
